name: KAILASH SATYARTHI CHILDREN'S FOUNDATION
briefDescription: KSCF builds on 35 years of legacy of Nobel Peace Laureate Mr. Kailash Satyarthi. As part of the Satyarthi Movement for Children, KSCF was established in 2004 as “Save the Childhood Foundation” (SCF) by Mr. Satyarthi with a goal to provide holistic & sustainable solutions to all forms of violence against children with an integrated approach. The Foundation’s goal is to end all violence against children by ensuring child protection through innovations, research, awareness generation, partnerships, and participation. KSCF has adopted a strategy of building greater collaboration between governments, businesses, and communities, ensuring effective laws, scaling know-how and successful practices.
